alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Western Franklin (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 5:02PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Worcester and northeastern Franklin Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 501 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Erving, or near Greenfield, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Greenfield, Orange, Deerfield, Athol, Winchendon, Montague, Sunderland, Northfield, Bernardston, Conway, Shelburne, Leverett, Erving, Shutesbury, Colrain, Gill, Royalston, New Salem, Wendell and Warwick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
